title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“MEN UNIQUE IN HABIT—Men are the only animals that make a habit of taking their own lives.” [From the Hartford Courant, n.d. Submitted by Grace Grant Snyder. That is a habit that is very easily broken.]
